titleStmt.title: Prosopopoeia. Or, A conference held at Angelo Castle, between the Pope, the Emperor, and the King of Spaine
titleStmt.author: Paul V, Pope, 1552-1621.
Matthias, Holy Roman Emperor, 1557-1619.
Philip, II, King of Spain, 1578-1621.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
